user.title: Solarseed TOU Energy Metering
user.description:
Select the energy sensor to track. This should be a kWh sensor from your energy meter.

After setup, configure your rate schedule in the TOU Metering panel (sidebar).

[Documentation]({docs_url})

error.sensor_not_found: Sensor not found in Home Assistant

init.title: TOU Metering Configuration
init.description:
Change the energy sensor or paste YAML to import rate schedules.

Export YAML from the [TOU Rate Calculator](https://johnnysolarseed.com/tou-calculator) or the [TOU Metering panel]({panel_url}).

Leave YAML empty to save sensor change only.

error.invalid_yaml: Invalid YAML syntax. Check formatting and try again.
error.invalid_config: YAML parsed but contains invalid TOU configuration. Check tier IDs, season grids (7 days × 24 hours), and holiday rules.
